effect.black_white: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

short_effect.black_2_white_2: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Special Defense by one stage.

flavor_text.black_white: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets’ Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: The opposing team is attacked with a spray of harsh acid. The acid may also lower the targets’ Sp. Def stats.
